description: Table by antidiagonals of coefficient of x^k in expansion of 1/((1+x)^2*(1-x)^n).
formula: Each row is partial sum of preceding row, i.e. T(n, k)=T(n-1, k)+T(n, k-1) with T(0, k)=(k+1)*(-1)^k and T(n, 0)=1.
crossrefs: Rows are effectively (with minor adjustments): A038608, A001057, A027656, A008805, A006918, A002624, A028346. Cf. A058394 which (adjusting for signs and an overlap of three rows) is effectively the continuation of this table for negative n.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 25 2001
